location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Captain Charles Sealy, Senior Marine Officer in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: In this letter Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, issues instructions for two cruisers to be stationed at the Bahrein [Bahrain] pearl banks, in order to prevent a recurrence of quarrels between tribes.
